fontFamilies.fontFamily: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif
fontFamilies.name: Site Font

core/post-comments-form.css: & textarea, input:not([type=submit]){border-radius:.25rem; border-color: var(--wp--preset--color--accent-6) !important;} & input[type=checkbox]{margin:0 .2rem 0 0 !important;} & label {font-size: var(--wp--preset--font-size--small); }
